import React, {useContext} from 'react' import { ProductsContext } from "../../context/ProductsContext"; import Carousel from "@itseasy21/react-elastic-carousel"; export default function Reviews() { const { reviews} = useContext(ProductsContext); const breakPoints = [ { width: 1, itemsToShow: 1 }, { width: 550, itemsToShow: 1, itemsToScroll:reviews.length}, { width: 768, itemsToShow: 1}, { width: 1200, itemsToShow: 1} ]; return ( <> {/* -- Testimonial Section -- */}
    > {reviews.map((review,index) => (

  • {review.text_review}

    {review.name}

    {review.job}

    {review.review_text}

    • ))}
) }
